name: History
description: Explore the rich history of civilizations and events that shaped the world. Questions related to historical events, figures, and civilizations.

name: Entertainment
description: Discover the world of entertainment, from movies to music and more. Questions about movies, TV shows, literature, music, and other forms of entertainment.

name: Technology
description: Stay updated on the latest technological innovations and advancements. Questions about computers, programming, inventions, and technological advancements.

name: Geography
description: Explore the diverse landscapes and regions of our planet. Questions about countries, capitals, landmarks, and geographical features.

name: Art
description: Immerse yourself in the world of creativity and artistic expression. Questions related to visual arts, literature, music, and famous artists.

name: Space
description: Embark on a journey to the cosmos and explore the wonders of space. Questions about astronomy, celestial bodies, space exploration, and related topics.

name: Science
description: Dive into the world of scientific discoveries and exploration. Questions covering various scientific disciplines, including physics, chemistry, biology, and earth science.

name: General culture
description: Learn about various aspects of culture, traditions, and general knowledge. A broad range of questions encompassing general knowledge, trivia, and recent events in various domains.
